title: The Twelfth Stone
description: The faerie world is fading. Human greed and destruction is giving rise to the basest, lowest, and evilest of faeries. Only Rionnag's arranged marriage will prevent earth's doom. But she will have none of it. Crossing over to the "Other Side” to escape her fate, she meets a human girl, Fiona, the lonely fatherless teenager who spends most of her time in the daydream world. Maggie, Fiona's mother, about to leave on her annual "retreat” to Scotland, harbors a secret that will affect them all. Unknowingly, Fiona holds the key to their ultimate rescue.
author: Jana Laiz
